1.0.name: wordpress/softly
1.0.description: An elegant and soft feeling theme. 3 color options, blue, green and brown. Easily change these in the Theme Options as well as the background. Ready for you to add your content easily. Comes with sidebar widget areas and 3 widget areas in the footer. You can also change the position of the sidebar on any page or choose to have no sidebar.
